name: 2sxc-quick-dialog
//version-notes: FYI: This version isn't used for the build.

scripts.// notes: Something isn't quite right with the setup. Basically the dev-dist which should copy to DNN must be restarted after every change :(
scripts.dev-dist: npm run postbuild:i18n && npm run postbuild:sourcemap && node ../webpack/distribute2.js ./dist/quick-dialog/browser dist/quick-dialog/
scripts.dev: concurrently "ng build && npm run postbuild:i18n && npm run postbuild:sourcemap && --configuration development --watch" "node ../webpack/distribute2.js ./dist/quick-dialog/browser dist/quick-dialog/ -w"
scripts.release: set NODE_ENV=production && ng build && npm run postbuild:i18n && npm run postbuild:sourcemap && node ../webpack/distribute2.js ./dist/quick-dialog/browser dist/quick-dialog/
